Whether it’s a routine crown fit or a tricky makeover, our team have the technology and skills to achieve consistent results for your patients.

[/dica_divi_carouselitem][dica_divi_carouselitem title=”Monolith Zirconia” sub_title=”Best Choice for NHS Crowns” button_url=”#” button_url_new_window=”on” image=”https://costech.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/costech-monolith-crown-110521.jpg” rating_position=”rating-under-title” rating_icon_size=”35px” rating_color=”#E57234″ blank_color=”#FF9D80″ content_padding=”25px|25px|25px|25px|true|true” rating_icon_size_tablet=”32px” rating_icon_size_phone=”” rating_icon_size_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ header_level=”h1″ header_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0C0063″ header_font_size=”30px” subtitle_font=”Poppins||||||||” subtitle_text_color=”#888CA5″ body_font=”Poppins|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#545768″ body_line_height=”1.7em” background_color=”#E4F2FF” background_enable_color=”on” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#b3b3b3″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” button_alignment=”right” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#141414″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

Monolith Full-Contour Zirconia offers a natural-looking aesthetic white crown and is available in all VITA shades from A-D. Professionals have rated the aesthetics of the product as 4.6 out of 5 on average, which demonstrates the versatility of the material to work in a broad range of aesthetic challenges.

[/dica_divi_carouselitem][dica_divi_carouselitem title=”BruxZir” sub_title=”Private Strong Zirconia” button_url=”#” button_url_new_window=”on” image=”https://costech.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/costech-bruxzir-crowns-bridges-110521.jpg” rating_position=”rating-under-title” rating_icon_size=”35px” rating_color=”#E57234″ blank_color=”#FF9D80″ content_padding=”25px|25px|25px|25px|true|true” rating_icon_size_tablet=”32px” rating_icon_size_phone=”” rating_icon_size_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ header_level=”h1″ header_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0C0063″ header_font_size=”30px” subtitle_font=”Poppins||||||||” subtitle_text_color=”#888CA5″ body_font=”Poppins|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#545768″ body_line_height=”1.7em” background_color=”#E4F2FF” background_enable_color=”on” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#b3b3b3″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” button_alignment=”right” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#141414″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

This minimally invasive, cost effective against gold, works with any preparation and is ultimately strong. BruxZir is the world’s number one brand in solid zirconia restorations. Made from virtually unbreakable, biocompatible medical-grade zirconia – the same element used to make bulletproof military armour.

[/dica_divi_carouselitem][dica_divi_carouselitem title=”ZirconArch” sub_title=”Zirconia with Porcelain Overlay” button_url=”#” button_url_new_window=”on” image=”https://costech.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/costech-zirconarch-bridge-110521.jpg” rating_position=”rating-under-title” rating_icon_size=”35px” rating_color=”#E57234″ blank_color=”#FF9D80″ content_padding=”25px|25px|25px|25px|true|true” rating_icon_size_tablet=”32px” rating_icon_size_phone=”” rating_icon_size_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ header_level=”h1″ header_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0C0063″ header_font_size=”30px” subtitle_font=”Poppins||||||||” subtitle_text_color=”#888CA5″ body_font=”Poppins|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#545768″ body_line_height=”1.7em” background_color=”#E4F2FF” background_enable_color=”on” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#b3b3b3″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” button_alignment=”right” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#141414″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

ZirconArch is aesthetics and strength coexisting in harmony without metal that can mar the beauty of a crown or a bridge. We only use superior quality Zirconia blocks with our in-house CAD-CAM systems. The milled restoration is sintered before being overlaid with e.max porcelain for excellent natural aesthetics.

[/dica_divi_carouselitem][dica_divi_carouselitem title=”Full Metal” sub_title=”Nickel-Free Restorations” button_url=”#” button_url_new_window=”on” image=”https://costech.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/costech-full-metal-crowns-110521.jpg” rating_position=”rating-under-title” rating_icon_size=”35px” rating_color=”#E57234″ blank_color=”#FF9D80″ content_padding=”25px|25px|25px|25px|true|true” rating_icon_size_tablet=”32px” rating_icon_size_phone=”” rating_icon_size_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ header_level=”h1″ header_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0C0063″ header_font_size=”30px” subtitle_font=”Poppins||||||||” subtitle_text_color=”#888CA5″ body_font=”Poppins|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#545768″ body_line_height=”1.7em” background_color=”#E4F2FF” background_enable_color=”on” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#b3b3b3″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” button_alignment=”right” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#141414″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

[/dica_divi_carouselitem][dica_divi_carouselitem title=”IPS e.max” sub_title=”Beautiful Aesthetics” button_url=”#” button_url_new_window=”on” image=”https://costech.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/costech-emax-bridge-110521.jpg” rating_position=”rating-under-title” rating_icon_size=”35px” rating_color=”#E57234″ blank_color=”#FF9D80″ content_padding=”25px|25px|25px|25px|true|true” rating_icon_size_tablet=”32px” rating_icon_size_phone=”” rating_icon_size_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ header_level=”h1″ header_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0C0063″ header_font_size=”30px” subtitle_font=”Poppins||||||||” subtitle_text_color=”#888CA5″ body_font=”Poppins|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#545768″ body_line_height=”1.7em” background_color=”#E4F2FF” background_enable_color=”on” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#b3b3b3″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” button_alignment=”right” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#141414″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

The nylon based material will bend and flex with the contours of the teeth and eating motions making the ComFlexin denture the most comfortable denture available.

[/dica_divi_carouselitem][dica_divi_carouselitem title=”Acrylic Dentures” sub_title=”Most Popular NHS Choice” button_url=”#” button_url_new_window=”on” image=”https://costech.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/costech-acrylic-dentures-110521.jpg” rating_position=”rating-under-title” rating_icon_size=”35px” rating_color=”gcid-349032fe-2ce4-4160-8629-8986805c5859″ blank_color=”gcid-349032fe-2ce4-4160-8629-8986805c5859″ content_padding=”25px|25px|25px|25px|true|true” rating_icon_size_tablet=”32px” rating_icon_size_phone=”” rating_icon_size_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ header_level=”h1″ header_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0C0063″ header_font_size=”30px” subtitle_font=”Poppins||||||||” subtitle_text_color=”#888CA5″ body_font=”Poppins|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#545768″ body_line_height=”1.7em” background_color=”#E4F2FF” background_enable_color=”on” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#b3b3b3″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” button_alignment=”right” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-349032fe-2ce4-4160-8629-8986805c5859%22:%91%22blank_color%22,%22rating_color%22,%22blank_color%22,%22rating_color%22%93,%22gcid-93f4b0b6-805f-47a5-8fe9-d501681d0062%22:%91%93}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#141414″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

With the combination of superior materials and expert knowledge of our technicians we create the most natural looking dentures for your patients.

[/dica_divi_carouselitem][dica_divi_carouselitem title=”Chrome Dentures” sub_title=”For extra strength and durability” button_url=”#” button_url_new_window=”on” image=”https://costech.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/costech-chrome-dentures-110521.jpg” rating_position=”rating-under-title” rating_icon_size=”35px” rating_color=”gcid-349032fe-2ce4-4160-8629-8986805c5859″ blank_color=”gcid-349032fe-2ce4-4160-8629-8986805c5859″ content_padding=”25px|25px|25px|25px|true|true” rating_icon_size_tablet=”32px” rating_icon_size_phone=”” rating_icon_size_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ header_level=”h1″ header_font=”Raleway|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0C0063″ header_font_size=”30px” subtitle_font=”Poppins||||||||” subtitle_text_color=”#888CA5″ body_font=”Poppins|300|||||||” body_text_color=”#545768″ body_line_height=”1.7em” background_color=”#E4F2FF” background_enable_color=”on” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#b3b3b3″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” button_alignment=”right” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-349032fe-2ce4-4160-8629-8986805c5859%22:%91%22blank_color%22,%22rating_color%22,%22blank_color%22,%22rating_color%22%93,%22gcid-93f4b0b6-805f-47a5-8fe9-d501681d0062%22:%91%93}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#141414″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”]
